message: Mink's departure frees me from the awkward tension.
But in its place rises a tempest of shame and regret.
I grab my bag and retrieve my headache medicine, together with the sleeping Ren.
I don't have many pills left, so for the moment I just take one. That should be enough to take the edge off.
Feeling a tiny bit better, I start Ren up.

name: 蓮
message: "...Aoba."

name: 蓮
message: "Are you alright? Your condition seems poor."
A wave of sadness hits me when I hear Ren's voice. I hug his little round body as tight as I can.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This sucks... What do I do...?"

name: 蓮
message: "Maybe you should get some rest. You just made it through a dangerous experience."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Dangerous?"

name: 蓮
message: "The photonarcotics temporarily disrupted your mind and senses."

name: 蓮
message: "As a result, your self-restraint was weakened and your Scrap power was partially awakened for an extended period."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No way.."

name: 蓮
message: "If you had stayed there much longer, you might have lost control of your power."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Lost control?"
The phrase gives me chills.
What'll happen if I lose control?
Will I destroy people on an even larger scale?
And what effect will it have on me?
Did Mink really take me to that place just to 'stretch our wings?'
I can't help but wonder if he brought me there just to see what would happen.
He wouldn't have... right?
Even if that was his goal, I still have no idea what he hoped to achieve.
I mean, that's nothing new...
But really. Why did he bring me there?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ouch..."
I stand up with Ren in my arms and drag my aching body to the couch.
I plop down on the soft cushions.
...What's going to happen now?
I don't think I can face Mink after what I did.
Besides...
While I was... having sex with Mink, I remember being overcome with this intense feeling of dread.
If I had to describe it, it was like gazing into my soul and finding a black abyss gazing back...
It was awful. What's wrong with me?
I have no answer. I know nothing about myself, or Mink, or anything else.

name: 蓮
message: "...You should get some rest."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I probably should."
I get off the couch with Ren in my arms and go back to my room on the second floor.
I lie down in bed and put my headphones on. As the music washes over me, I close my eyes and try to go to sleep.
I just... hope I can...
